properties.title: Roadmap Milestones - The Apache Struts Web Application Framework

section.name: Development Milestones
section.p: These are some general ideas we have about what may happen in the Struts 1.x series. This is a whiteboard and everything here is subject to change.

subsection.name: Struts 1.0.0 (complete)
subsection.p: Major refactoring of Struts internals to provide support for modules and a new "config" object series. Bundles Struts Tiles and Struts Validator into main distribution. The initial release of Struts EL is provided as an optional package.

subsection.name: Struts 1.2.4 (complete)
subsection.p: Continued refactorings of the Struts 1.x product series.

ul.li: Removed deprecations created in the 1.0 to 1.1 timeframe, and prior
Added support for wildcard mappings.
Other minor enhancements, improvements, and refactorings

subsection.name: Struts 1.2.6 (complete)
subsection.p: Migrated repository to Subversion; update website.

subsection.name: Struts 1.2.x (pending)
subsection.p: Minor enhancements, improvements, and refactorings only, as needed. New features should be added to the 1.3.x series.

subsection.name: Struts 1.3.x (pending)
subsection.p: Evolutionary enhancements to product base, based on existing features or codebases.

ul.li:
Divide distribution into subprojects
core, apps, el, faces, site, taglibs
flow (new)
scripting (new)
Complete support for Maven builds (pending)
Move core to "Struts Chain" Request Processor (pending)
Move to Commons Resources (if available)
Enhance all configs to extend one configuration element from another,as is done with Tiles Definitions
Add a Ant-style properties file to make variable substitutions within the XML elements, as found in iBATIS and Spring.
Bundle subproject GA releases into Linux-style distributions (Struts 1.3.0 = (Core 1.0.x + Taglibs 1.0.x + Extras 1.0.x))
ActionCommand - A Commons Chain Command-like interface with one method: void Execute(ActionContext context)
ActionContext - A Commons Chain Context that implements the Action class logical API (same signatures).
ViewContext - A Commons Chain Context that implements the combined VelocityStruts logical API (same signatures).
Consider adding support for Portlets by specifying an alternate Request Processor catalog.
Consider combining DTDs.
Consider adding catalog element.
Consider refactoring for Spring.
Consider a "smart" action type: executes Action class or ActionCommand interface, as given.
Consider a "populate" method on ActionForm.
Consider a "FormContext" mechanism.
Consider multiple controllers.
Consider an alternate configuration file.
Consider "Nested" or "hierarchical" and locale-sensitive modules

subsection.name: Other potential enhancements for the 1.x.x series

ul.li: Consider Cocoon Plugin

Consider adopting several popular extensions, including:
Layout
SSL Ext
Stxx (XLST)
TestCase
Consider encouraging the use of XDoclet and other code generation technologies to streamline development.
